metadata.title: CVE-2023-0996 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: There is a vulnerability in the strided image data parsing code in theemscripten wrapper for libheif. An attacker could exploit this through acrafted image file to cause a buffer overflow in linear memory during amemcpy call.

criterions.comment: libheif package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
